ygData.subject: Re: [Re: [eqbards] New message  ]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Tyunes, Thanks much for the feedback...it s greatly appreciated! Question (probably stupid), what is maximumeg? I tried it as a URL but no go and then I did
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Tyunes,

Thanks much for the feedback...it's greatly appreciated! Question (probably
stupid), what is maximumeg? I tried it as a URL but no go and then I did a
search for it and nothing.

I have been looking for a site that has the going in-game prices for armor and
weapons and this sounds like it may have that.....

Thanks!


Bill Costlow <atlatyl@...> wrote:

> Hi Melodii,
>
> I would recommend finding something lighter that
> doesn't bring down your stamina when fighting...look
> for something under 5 lbs.
>
> A friend in my guild sold me a thulian claw (I'm still
> paying on it...) that does just this. There are other
> weapons that would do just as well. You might want to
> check out the bard weapon section of maximumeg as the
> comments and going price listed there will help you
> target the weapon you want.
>
> Yours in Song
>
> Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
>
>
> --- Lilyana Dearheart <Lilyanatwin@...>
> wrote:
> > Hello fellow Bards!
> >
> > I am new to the list and I would like to say that it
> > is wonderful the
> > information that is shared among the bards of EQ. I
> > am a lvl 11 Bard on the
> > Karana server and I need some information please.
> >
> > My bard is a half-elf and I currently have a full
> > set of bronze armor and I'm
> > equipped with a Turtle-shell Helm and I have a
> > barbed leather whip and the
> > screaming mace for weapons. I currently have the
> > standard instruments, the
> > drum for the spidersilk quest and a mandolin.
> >
> > My question is this....what kind of armor, weapons,
> > and instruments would be
> > worthy of investment for me at this point?
> >
> > My finances are slightly better, though not great,
> > than a normal lvl 11 as my
> > bard is my secondary character, albeit quickly
> > becoming primary because I love
> > being a bard!
> >
> > Any help and advice would be greatly
> > appreciated....Thanks!!!
> >
> > V/R,
> >
> > Melodii (Bard of 11 seasons)
> > Lilyana (Paladin of 17 seasons)
> >
> >
